DOCNAME: CASE OF OKOLELOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .
CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the non - enforcement of domestic decisions and of the lack of any effective remedy in domestic law .
